name: BLUE DIAMOND GROWERS
sampleDescriptions: Support tax reform and simplification of the tax code; Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (H.R. 1).
Support of Free Trade Agreements and export promotion programs; Obtaining a duty reduction on shelled and in-shell almonds to China and India; Inquiries regarding importation of almond base to Japan;

Support funding for the Market Access Program; Support measures regarding the health and welfare of honeybees and accompanying pollination issues for almonds; Support the inclusion of tree nuts in Chi
Support Value Added Grant program; Support funding for the Market Access Program; Support inclusion of language in appropriations bills for water.
Support the passage of immigration reform; Support appropriation requests for temporary immigration relief regarding the H-2A program; monitoring legislation regarding sanctuary cities.
